assessment_scope.assessment_criteria_name: Selection process for designers and contractors
assessment_scope.scoping_guidance: Scope out for Design Only Assessments where the Designer has no input to the Contractor selection process.
There may be circumstances where it is appropriate to scope out this criteria, for example if there are no sub-contractors involved.
Scope out if the scheme concerned is intrinsically not 'operable', such as flood defence banks.
The decision to scope out will depend on the nature, scale, location and context of the project, and on the interests and responsibilities of the parties to the project.
